website_summaries.verdict: An affordable outdoor model, fired by propane, with delicious, "oil-free" results. The best on the market today.
pros: Uses infrared heat, which is cleaner and healthier than most other methods
turkeys and large cuts of meat

customer_reviews.title: Tastier and healthier than frying.
customer_reviews.text: I've deep fried turkeys for years. A friend turned me on to this fryer and I gave it a shot. The turkey today for Thanksgiving was phenomenal. Moist and perfectly cooked. The deep fried turkeys were a little dry but not this one. The best part is that it is a LOT healthier than deep frying and easier to clean up. I injected Cajun Creole butter and rubbed it with oil and lime juice and slathered it with a spicy rub. 16 pound bird in the fryer for 3.5 hours. Don't listen to folks telling you 10 minutes a pound... here in Ohio it took 3 1/2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Dozer189

customer_reviews.title: Great ribs
customer_reviews.text: Got the big easy Yesterday Had to try it out I put a dry rub on ribs and hung them up on the rack Done in an hour They were great.One thing they can do is have instructions to put this together And a good recipe book that comes with it
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hafner Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great fryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I saw this fryer and decided to give it a try because I'm terrified of the whole turkey frying with oil situation, and was worried I wouldn't get that crispy exterior a traditional fried turkey has. Boy was I wrong!! I couldn't be more satisfied with the results I got!! It did a really good job of cooking the turkey to perfection, while leaving the inside very moist. I took one star off because the assembly was difficult when aligning the screws. I highly recommend this fryer because it's amazing!!
customer_reviews.author: jann25

customer_reviews.title: Best money you will ever spend!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fryer I’ve ever owned. The 16 pound turkeys, pork ribs and chicken cone out tasting the best. I also found disposable drip pans, 50 for $20 that work great. Rectangular Disposable Aluminum Foil Pan Take Out Food Containers with Flat Board Lids, Steam Table Baking Pans, 32 oz, 2.25 lb, Quart [50 Pack]
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: The best oiless fryer
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best ribs, Turkey, chicken..You name it. So glad to not have to spend $40 a piece on the peanut oil from the older fryers. Easy clean up. Will definitely buy again for gift. I would suggest not being in a hurry and taking the time to keep the heat a bit low so your meat turns out flavorful and juicy. It is possible to dry the meat out quickly and it will be tuff. Patience is key.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Hargenrader

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is all I really use now it cooks food so perfect. By far one of the best things I bought off Amazon. Takes a little getting used to but the payoff is great. I have cooked 4 whole chickens at a time . Just 1 Turkey. Get the extra racks and holders. There are plenty of recipes online that come out great!!!Once ya learn how to use one you will probably never use your oven again to cook a Turkey or a chicken or......
customer_reviews.author: Shuned one

customer_reviews.title: Be safe and lose the oil
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving it over oil, used a Cajun marinade on a chicken and it came out great. Takes around 18 min/ lb to cook that's the only downfall over oil is the cooking time
customer_reviews.author: Garry H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this fryer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this fryer. Had baby back ribs the first night we got it and a prime rib the following night. Both turned out perfect. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit!
customer_reviews.text: Friends were skeptical when we told them that one of our two "Early Thanksgiving" turkeys were going to be cooked "Big Easy Style", but in the end they were unable to tell the difference between it and the traditionally baked turkey. A simple olive oil rub down and a coating of dry rub was all it got. An hour and half later our 13 lb turkey was cooked to perfection. Clean up was a breeze. We're looking forward ti using this again and again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Simple is good
customer_reviews.text: This is the easiest and best way to cook a turkey. I can't see doing another turkey in any other way. Just prepare the turkey, put it in, turn it one and check it a few hours later to see if it's done. The meat was moist and the skin was crisp. As far as ribs though, I'll stick with my smoker. Cooking ribs in this works fine, but they are lacking any true barbecue flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Meyer

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVESTMENT! The turkey skin was crispy and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased this when I googled "nest turkey fryer". We were weary about purchasing an oil less frying when we were trying to get a turkey.... BEST INVESTMENT! The turkey skin was crispy and the meat was so juicy! A couple of warninhs.. one, I read reviews to buy your own thermometer even though Char broil provides you with one, I did do so and I felt more confident doing so. My other warning, my package did NOT come with "good" instructions on how to put together. My husband had to YouTube (which.kinda helped) and had his brother help to... We obviously got a great turkey, but Thanksgiving dinner was a tad bit late :)
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: So we bought this to cook our turkey this Thanksgiving ...
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this to cook our turkey this Thanksgiving in order to accommodate for a family member who is not able to eat fried foods. We cooked accordingly to the directions but when we started slicing the turkey, part of the thigh was not cooked completely through but only one side, the other side cooked perfectly. Not sure why this happened and directions did not say anything about rotating it. Maybe we need to do this next time? We will give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We call it the Big Fail
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line waste of money and I have returned it. Been deep frying turkeys in peanut oil for years and decided to try this so we could have some more healthy turkey (no oil). Received the Big Fail put it together and seasoned. Next day did a pre Thanksgiving test run with a 3 LB beef roast. Took 4 hours to cook the roast and after 4 hours of cooking the roast was like a piece of rubber. Since the roast took 3 hours to ruin no telling how long it would take to ruin my Thanksgiving day turkeys. I stuck with tried and true deep frying in oil.
customer_reviews.author: Sam_R_TX

customer_reviews.title: Oil Fried or Not Oil Fried That Is the Question
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fryer for those that are not looking for authentic oil fried turkey. It was probably more healthy but lacked the flavor that an oil fried bird delivers. While you could marinate your bird more I doubt the extra effort would be able to accomplish the same effect that an oil fried bird. It was extremely easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best. Turkey. Ever. Don’t Hesitate!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t wait to leave a review for this wonderful item! Oil free deep frying produced the best turkey we have ever had. The skin was perfect and the meat was so tender that you could cut it with your fork! The deep fryer performed exactly as promised. The bird was ready right on time. The basket holds up to 16 pounds of bird and we tested that with a 15 1/2 bird. I wouldn’t recommend anything over the 16 pound limit. The pan caught all of the turkey drippings for spot one gravy. Don’t hesitate to buy the Charbroil Oil Free Deep Fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Proud Geek Mom

customer_reviews.title: No...... it does not replace deep frying.....not even close
customer_reviews.text: I ignorantly bought this with the idea that I could forgo the expensive peanut oil routine every year... I have been deep frying turkeys for 15+ years and should have seen this for what it is.....an outdoor propane oven that cooks a turkey not much different than an normal oven does. It does not cook as evenly as deep frying, it takes just as long to cook and even with multiple thermometers telling me the meat was 165 the breast meat at the bone and under the legs was undercooked. I have lots of 4 letter words for this thing. It is not even close deep frying so don't believe all these glowing reviews that its just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwood

customer_reviews.title: 10 Stars if I could !
customer_reviews.text: Best cooking item I ever purchased ! This made the most succulent turkey I ever had . I brined overnight, injected with butter and broth and rubbed with a poulty rub. 15 lb Turkey done in 2.5 hrs. Also purchased a Bluetooth digital probe to make it easy. Nothing but bones left. Now we eat turkey monthly not just at Thanksgiving ! Easy cleanup. No $$$ oil to get rid of ! 10 stars if I could !
customer_reviews.author: B. Jules

customer_reviews.title: Works great! You will make more than one turkey per year!!
customer_reviews.text: What a cool propane cooker! I have used it to make turkeys just for the heck of it. Works well for prime rib as well. I would recommend the additional basket so everything isn't piled on top of each other. Makes cooking things smaller than a turkey a lot easier and cooking more even.
customer_reviews.author: The Zen Doc

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to get away from Oil Frying Turkeys. Prefer the Big Easy... No oil splatter mess, cheaper, less cleanup. Does take longer but easily planned around. NOTE - the drum should rest on the lip of the upper ring. Ours was not properly assembled upon receiving but easily fixed by removing/replacing a couple of screws.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Mobley

customer_reviews.title: Useless outside, yet supposed to be outside.
customer_reviews.text: Thank God we have a garage. This Tday was a constant wind (not too heavy) and the flames aren't high enough to hold up to that. It got shut off during seasoning then 30 minutes into cooking. Had to bring it into the garage to cook. And even then, the corner of the turkey closest to the bottom didn't fully cook (while the rest was perfect).
customer_reviews.author: Keith Meehan

customer_reviews.title: As good as the last model
customer_reviews.text: I had the original for 3 years but left it outside uncovered so it had to go. This year our 12 lb turkey turned out perfectly, was plenty of room for a larger bird. I would highly suggest the Char-Broil cover as well, it looks great and should keep the fryer nice for a lot longer!
customer_reviews.author: Ennio Giusti

customer_reviews.title: Wow, far better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I originally decided to fry a turkey for Thanks Giving, but came across this grill in the search. After watching some reviews on Youtube I took the plunge. It was easy to assemble and it worked 1st time. This grilling method exceeded my expectations! I did a test run on a whole chicken last night, let me tell you it was by far the easiest grilling I've ever done. The chicken was truly tender and very juicy. I highly recommend letting it rest so the juices go back into the meat. My roommate said she never tasted breast as juicy before! I agreed and suggest you get one of these grills, you will not look back!
customer_reviews.author: Bill Faught

customer_reviews.title: Won't cook
customer_reviews.text: I guess I have received a defective unit. I purchased the fryer to cook a turkey for Thanksgiving. I practiced with a 6.5 lb. chicken. I cooked of 2 hours and it was still only 85 degrees. I checked the troubleshooting guide, broke down and reassembled the unit and tried again with a small 2.5 lb. chicken. After half an hour it had warmed up from 45 degrees to 55 degrees. I am returning and asking for a replacement. Hopefully I will be able to provide a better review later.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Crawford

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for Thanksgiving, before Thanksgiving we tried a chicken it it and it came out fantastic! Our Thanksgiving Turkey was honestly the best we've ever had. Over the weekend we tried a Tri-Tip in it and it came out perfect. It is built extremely well, easy to use and works perfect every time. I cant recommend this thing enough. For the price it is one amazing cooker!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Childs

customer_reviews.title: Good fooId but questionable if repackaged.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this fryer for Thanksgiving after being told by several people swore by it. When we started putting it together we noticed a couple of pieces out of the plastic sleeves. After we took it outside for the initial seasoning we found several spots where the outter paint was chipped off which will lead to trusting. Now we are concerned this fryer was a return. It is too late to order a new one and we had already seasoned it. It did a great job cooking our test run with chicken but am still frustrated with the appearance.
customer_reviews.author: DandG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Results
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've used the typical turkey oil fryer with great results. The turkey has a nice crisp outside skin but moist meat all the way through. The Char-Broil was easy to use and clean up was much easier than with an oil fryer. However, the skin was sort of crisp, but very, very tough. The meat inside, especially the breast white meat, was dry. I followed the cooking directions and was really hoping this would produce a great moist turkey without the oil mess. Unfortunately it didn't happen.
customer_reviews.author: Bobino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and an amazing product!! 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is truly impressive. I bought this for thanksgiving 2019 and tried it out with a whole chicken for a test run. I don't think I have ever had such an amazing piece of chicken before.crispy outside and extremely juicy inside! I highly recommend this product. Can't wait to try some pork shoulder or possibly try ribs in it!
customer_reviews.author: Cazer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now and stop frying turkeys.
customer_reviews.text: So we bought this to replace frying a turkey. Understand that frying a turkey tastes great and you won't get that exactly from this but everyone knows frying a turkey is a big hassle. It's messy, expensive and just a lot of trouble. Well this product is the next best thing to actually frying a turkey. The flavor of the turkey was great even though it wasn't the exact same as a true fried turkey. But who wants to do that anyway. I would totally recommend you buy this product immediately and quit frying turkeys.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Riley

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this trying to avoid the oil frying. The small turkeys and chickens cooked in this took way too long. My husband put 6# chickens on and they took 6 hours! He had to modify it to raise the birds up so it could cook better. It didn’t cook evenly either! He had to flip the birds even thought it says not to. I had to return it because of how terrible it was. The taste was not good! Too dry and tough. We are going back to peanut oil frying!
customer_reviews.author: Huntress

customer_reviews.title: Great Way To Cook
customer_reviews.text: The more I use it then the more I learn and I did order the basket and other goodies to go with it and they are much needed so you can broil about anything you like. You do need a wind breaker when broiling on a windy day and a remote temperature reader really comes in handy and can save you a lot of steps + assure you that your meat is cooked just right and not over cooked. All & all this is a great product and cooks really fast A+A+A+A+
customer_reviews.author: Duke M. Barron

customer_reviews.title: Faulty unit!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for the first (& only!) time on Thanksgiving day to fry our turkey. I'd seasoned and prepped the unit; the unit seemed fine (i.e.) it ignited and continued operating throughout BUT after 3 hrs (not the 140 minutes suggested) trying to reach the necessary 165F, the breast of the turkey was 180 F & the legs (in the lower part of the basket, as instructed) were 120F! We had to throw away our T'giving turkey & I'm returning the unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Joan K Brawley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to get away from oik frying my turkeys and it works even better than I expected. My only complaint is that it is a set and forget...has no temp ajustment. That's OK but it looks like it is supposed to adjust and the instructions mention nothing about that. It took a call to Char Broil and then waiting until the rep got technical advice from someone else. One other thing. If you get one of these you MUST have an external thermometer with a probe.
customer_reviews.author: earl j reese

customer_reviews.title: All of it turned out great and were LOVED by our guests
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cook turkeys and chickens in. We have had it one month and have cooked a whole chicken, whole turkey, ribs, and beef rump roast. All of it turned out great and were LOVED by our guests!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Consumer YO

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: We always deep fried turkey at thanksgiving and the oil costs a fortune and has to be thrown away. A friend had one of these so we ordered and Oh my goodness it was a life changer! We injected with marinade (truth be told), but the turkey came out juicy, cooked perfectly, and crispy on the skin! The only catch is that it does take longer to cook than deep frying in oil. However, as long as you time it appropriately it frees up your oven for all of the other goodies!!! A must buy! 🙌🙌
customer_reviews.author: Josh Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I have friends who have them and they love theirs. Mine doesn't want to cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: I took a chance on this because of the mixed reviews. I have friends who have them and they love theirs. Mine doesn't want to cook evenly, so I struggle to get a fully cooked turkey. I would love this cooker if it cooked as well as my friends do, I'm pretty sure I'm using it correctly, but no matter what I try, the bottom half seems undercooked every time!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary L.

customer_reviews.title: Not what we had hoped for...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cook evenly and took much longer than indicated. Tried it 3 times and each time had to finish cooking in oven. We returned it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: NCGal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever! We camped over Thanksgiving weekend and didn't want to deal with gallons of oil or a turkey fryer. A friend mentioned this 'oil-less' fryer and we ordered it right away. We hooked it up to a propane tank, dropped in a 16 pound bird and had an awesome, juicy turkey in 3 hours and 20 minutes. We only checked on it to watch it cook. It will cook more than turkey but we haven't tried roasts or veggies yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paula L

customer_reviews.title: Wow what a perfect product.
customer_reviews.text: Wow what a perfect product.. I love this so much.. Works incredibly easy -- best thing is to buy the accessories too because you'll want to cook everything in it.. I just wished it came with a grill for the top so you can use it as a grill but its so perfect - and doesn't smoke so it can stay in the back porch without a mess.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: The most convenient way possible to cook a bird
customer_reviews.text: Free up your oven for other things, cook it cleaner, tastes better, maintains a ton of the moisture. I didn't take the top all the way off like it says to in cooler weather, kinda half on half off, stuck a thermometer through the lid to see if it's staying good and hot in there when it's cold out. I was looking for the least trouble, and best results, it's the only way I'll be cooking a turkey
customer_reviews.author: PMor

customer_reviews.title: Love it! So happy I bought this for my husband, he loves it to and loves to cook with it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loves it! We used it to cook our Thanksgiving day turkey and it was the most perfectly juicy, crispy skinned, deliciously seasoned (patting myself on the back for the seasoning) turkey we have ever had. In fact we and our family loved it so much we made another one the next week. We’ve also done a chicken and a ham... and for Christmas, I bought him the basket and kabob sticks to try more recipes. I would definitely recommend this air-fryer. It’s sturdy and well built, easy to clean and works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to use and the roast we made in it the first night was awesome. Follow instructions for setting up and seasoning the unit and it is fool proof with only one on temperature. We watched a few videos for tips about using (not using) the lid that helped as well as cook times for different meats and sizes (the max size for beef is smaller than turkey for example). Anyway it was so tasty! Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol Cassoni

customer_reviews.title: This ruined Thanksgiving 2019
customer_reviews.text: The center metal part where the basket fits in was wobbly and there was no way we could find to tighten it but decided to go a head and try it. We purchased and 11 lb turkey and looked at the timing sheet per lb. After 4 hrs the turkey was removed only lightly brown and raw inside. This was a disaster would not recommend to anyone else. The assembly directions were also terrible. Amazon credited the product even though it was over a month because I wasn't using it until Thanksgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The first experience was great and we are gonna have some fun with this thing.
customer_reviews.text: Our first try was leg quarters and we sneaked away for a spin and got back 25 minutes late going 1:10 rather than 45 min. The chicken was still moist and very flavorful and the whole yams that were in the bunk basket were amazing. No butter required! The wireless dual thermometer really takes the guess work out and makes it fun for a non pro like me.
customer_reviews.author: Gary B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome outdoor air fryer
customer_reviews.text: We were uncertain how cooking a turkey for Thanksgiving was going to go. But we were all surprised by how it turned. Very moist, crispy outside. Cooking time (we had a 13lb turkey) was a little shorter than cooking in an oven, maybe half hour. I definitely recommend. We haven't cooked anything else in yet, but plan to, it's just be really cold or rainy.
customer_reviews.author: Delarosa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use...easy to clean....performed like described. It's actually fun to use and at Thanksgiving it performed as a stadium kitchen entertainment feature. Bought it on accolades of a close friend and it exceeded my expectations. Have done chicken, ribs and turkey and I highly recommend. Looking forward to many more cooking explorations.
customer_reviews.author: Deusa

customer_reviews.title: Fantaatic Turkey!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased before as a gift for my aunt. This one was for my sister. I was at my aunts when they made a turkey last Easter. It was honestly one of the best turkeys I have ever eaten. Moist and juicy all throughout, with golden crispy skin. It took a little longer than I thought it would, to cook. However, it’s more than worth the wait!
customer_reviews.author: Andra Myers

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I did a test run with a 6.5 lb chicken and it has taken over 2 hours to cook. I had so high hopes for this.... Not happy
customer_reviews.author: Ron Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fryer, disappointing basket
customer_reviews.text: I would give this fryer 5 stars if the basket wasn't made so cheap. We've fried 3 turkeys in it over Thanksgiving and Christmas with excellent results, much better than oil frying! However, 3 wires on the basket broke after first use. It clear to see others are weak and it probably won't hold more than one more item before having to be replaced. Other than the basket I highly recommend this fryer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've never cooked a turkey myself, and I've never had a "fried" turkey either. Now I can honestly say that I did not know that a turkey could be soo JUICY! We did have some trouble with the burner at first. It seemed as if it wasn't putting out enough heat. I basically just turned it off and then turned it back on, and wa-la it was cooking at full potential. I'll admit I was a little disappointed at first. Looking forward to using this with other meats.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew W. Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Meat stays so juicy and flavorable.
customer_reviews.text: We first tried the char broil with chicken breasts. We injected and did a rub. Turned out great. We next did our Thanksgiving Turkey. This was the best turkey we ever had. We’ve also experimented with swish kabobs and ham. It is a learning curve to determine how much time to plan for (weather does play in to it), but so worth it! We expect to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Worst money I ever spent.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this several times to make sure there were no user errors. 2 turkeys bother were thawed and dry. First I cooked with out the lid and the bottom of the turkey did not cook. 2nd bird used lid first 20 minutes and last 30minute same results except this time wings and legs were over cooked. The I cooked leg of lamb the top over cooked the bottom was under cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Stockman

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Worked super well for 16 pound turkey this Thanksgiving. Family said it was the best they had. I did dry brine the turkey overnight and brought the turkey up to room temperature before adding to air fryer. Also injected with homemade injection marinade using butter, olive oil and poultry seasoning. Put apples, celery, thyme, onions and carrots in the cavity with plenty of salt. All in all turned out really well.
customer_reviews.author: jaxgirl0619

customer_reviews.title: Delicious perfectly "oil-less" fried meats
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Big Easy and my parents loved it so much.. we had to get a second! If you ever want delicious ribs or pork belly or anything really.. get one of these babies. Just season up your meat, give it a light spray of oil, and set it in this oil less fryer... You will get a nice crispy meat, still juicy in the middle! I can't wait to see what I will cook up next.
customer_reviews.author: PB & J

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: One of the prongs on the basket broke the very first time that we used it on thanksgiving. We still had one more turkey to fry. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Tawana Butts

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: We made 2 turkeys with this it is not as fast as a deep frying .deep frying is 3 min per pound this is 10 min per pound but it comes out delicious, moist crisp skin . I am very happy with the flavor the insert gets discolored after the 1 st use but they said it is normal. I would recommed it .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs C. C

customer_reviews.title: Easy, delicious outdoor cooking.
customer_reviews.text: Easy, delicious outdoor cooking. I've burned up a lot of meat on standard grills after getting distracted by kids, dogs, weeds, women, neighbors, company, etc, etc, etc. Not with the Big Easy. Put the meat in, set a timer, and come back to perfectly cooked meat every time.
customer_reviews.author: Pistol Pete

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cook our thanksgiving turkey which turned out to be one of the best turkeys I have ever had! Since then we have used it for numerous other meats like, pork loin, venison roast, rabbit and event brats. Everything was soo good! It locks in the moisture and crisps the outside. We ended up purchasing the accessory pack which I also recommend, it allows you to cook so many other things. If you are considering buying it, just do it, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: haley

customer_reviews.title: Recommend...Delicious eats!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son-in-law for Christmas and he and my daughter couldn't be happier. Cooked a turkey in it New Years Eve and it was absolutely delicious...took a little longer than expected but it was the best ever. Plan to do a lot of cooking so with use will come experience. Very happy with purchase...might have to replace my oil cooking equipment and get one for myself..
customer_reviews.author: JRMJR

customer_reviews.title: I really like the new design for the leg support
customer_reviews.text: I really like the new design for the leg support. It is definitely more sturdy than the previous version. I am on my second Big Easy and really enjoy these as an alternative to using my wife's kitchen. If I can just get her to not be afraid of starting it! Speaking of starting, my ignitor doesn't seem to work so I have to use one of my lighters. Other than that it is all good!
customer_reviews.author: Athan Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Two Turkeys Devoured!!
customer_reviews.text: I love to deep fry my turkeys during the holidays but I didn’t like all the cooking oil I had to get rid of afterwards so when I seen this Deep Fryer Oil-free, I was excited. I absolutely love it. It took about 2 hours to cook a 13lb. Turkey. I didn’t inject it, I just seasoned it inside and out and it tasted amazing. It looked like it was fried in oil. It was juicy and all my guest didn’t believe me until I took them outside to see the fryer.
customer_reviews.author: Shamaine K

customer_reviews.title: Best gift to give or receive!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third big easy we have bought in the last year. A friend introduced it to us last thanksgiving and we loved it so much we bought one for my husbands parents, one for my parents, and one for ourselves! Perfect turkey’s every time- all year long. Leaves tons of room in the kitchen for cooking all that other good stuff. Lots of fun recipes for different tastes! Best gift to give or receive!
customer_reviews.author: spicyahi

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the original Big Easy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Big Easy and I was disappointed in the new design. It did not cook as well as the original design. I returned it and will stick with my original one. Pains me to to give a bad review because I love my first Big Easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: It works great, practice with a turkey breast first
customer_reviews.text: Note: READ the instructions, make sure you season it properly before using. I would bet that 9 out of ten of the negative reviews were from people not reading the directions. It works great, practice with a turkey breast first. We love it. The mess is so minimal, it is a joke. I would also recommend buying the cover, to keep it clean and rust free.
customer_reviews.author: M. Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Safer! Juicy & Crispy
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to make our Thanksgiving turkey in it! We were not disappointed! No mess; no huge container of oil to deal with afterwards! Safer to use in our opinion. No oil splatters! The turkey was juicy inside and the skin was very crispy! Juicy & Crispy just the way we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Maria

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cooking option
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive at first, but what the heck, I'll give it a try. First thing was pork tenderloins, salt and pepper rub. 45 minutes later they were at proper temperature and OMG they were delicious. This fryer has changed the way I cook now. Thanks ever so much. Outstanding in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Kozora

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use and the meat came out great!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this fryer for the Christmas holidays and cooked a pork butt and a turkey in it. It was easy to set up and use, and the meat came out great!! Much cleaner than that traditional fryer method. Only real issue is the meat cage is a pain to clean but using a good ole piece of steel wool and some elbow grease did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Minton

customer_reviews.title: All in all a good buy
customer_reviews.text: We changed from an oil fryer to this one for thanksgiving. It was so much better! No heating the oil, no waiting for it to cool, no messy clean up of the oil. It still has to be cleaned out but way easier. The seasoning part threw me a little but very easy. The turkey size was limited but the flavor and crispy skin was great. Another plus, You don’t have to stress about it being completely dry before you put it in the fryer. All in all a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Letha G. Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: No buyers remorse with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. There is a drawer at the bottom of the cooker which catches the drippings. Especially with Turkey, I want gravy so drippings are needed. Need to check on drippings while cooking, tinfoil lined drawer can fill and may need emptying while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: WOW am I glad I bought this fryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after going back and forth comparing to an original oil type fryer. WOW am I glad I bought this fryer! This oilless fryer is amazing. I have made 3 turkeys already this year and every one of them came out juicy, crispy, just perfect. I have also made ribs, steaks and chicken. Perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy REAL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Air Fryer / Great Alternative to Oil Fryer
customer_reviews.text: I love this air fryer. Never going back to oil fryer. It is easy to use and cleanup is a breeze. It is very easy to put together. Simply follow instructions and you are all set. I used it for Thanksgiving and Christmas turkeys and I was a hit with the family.
customer_reviews.author: Elroy Bethell

customer_reviews.title: Assembly Instructions?
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two so far. The first one was damaged and was obviously previously opened. There were no assembly instructions. Bought a second one to replace the first one. Guess what? No assembly instructions. There are also no instructions online. I can figure out most of the assembly but where do the two bars go?
customer_reviews.author: Chad Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: We use a small air fryer for regular meals and chose to purchase this for special holiday cooking (turkey, ham, pork roast). We wish we bought it sooner! The meats come out juicy. Our Thanksgiving Turkey was the best we ever tasted. Just be aware that the timing of cooking is slightly different versus. recommendations of conventional baking.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaMadida

customer_reviews.title: Great item!
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy our Big Easy so much. We've made Thanks giving turkey's in it 2 years in a row and use it throughout the year and are always satisfied with the outcome. Ribs, chicken, pork, pot roasts all come out super juicy!
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I just got a bad one but the base attaches by 6 screws. The center ones are easy but the ends are hard to reach. You either need a tiny screwdriver or an extremely long one to fit through the feet. Also the holes did not line up on 2 of them making the base not secure at all. Also the piece with the propane value was bent where it connects to the outside shell, I had to bend it into place to fit. Most likely returning since the base is not secure unless I can figure something else out.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan!
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping I would love this. First time took almost 5 hours to get the bird to temp. This time moved in indoors (garage) thinking it may have been too cold out last time we do live in NY. Did our second turkey today a 14lb bird should have taken 2.5 hours over 3 hours later still not done! Middle won’t get over 130! Very disappointed thought it would be a great way to make our birds now I’m just going to make it in the ovencooks even and quicker there! Wish I could return it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Love my big easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this big easy cooker right before Thanksgiving, wanted it to cook fried turkeys. I cooked a total of 5 turkeys during the holidays. My quests loved the turkeys and couldn't stop bragging about how moist and good they tasted. I also have cooked whole chickens and cooked chicken wings and other meats as well. Turned out great!! I would highly recommend buying this fryer. I purchased the propane cooker. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: This was, I'd argue, better than any oil fryer you can buy. You can better season your meat with this and it was just as tender and juicy as the oil fryer. Best investment I've made in a long time. Very easy to use and versatile. Can't wait to do some brisket in it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Got a lemon
customer_reviews.text: Guess we got a lemon. Sister loves hers and we have used it with great results. We bought ours on her recommendation and have had such bad results we are going to toss in the trash. Going back to our oil fryer. Good luck if you decide to buy!
customer_reviews.author: C. Pritchett

customer_reviews.title: Quick cleanup and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used a friends before but this year I decided to buy one myself. I’ve only used it to cook a turkey but it came out great! The instructions say 10 minutes per pound but I feel after you get close to desired temp I would check it more often. Anyways it’s a lot cheaper and less messier than using peanut oil.
customer_reviews.author: Julie O

customer_reviews.title: Requires assembly. Significant waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a fairly easy, pull out of the box type product. But it requires assembly and frankly, the pieces don't line up. Char-Broil could do a lot better to delight customers. If this was fully factory assembled, I would enjoy it a lot more. With a busy life, I wasn't looking for a project, I was looking for an appliance.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best Fryer for Turkey EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: We used this for Thanksgiving as we currently live in a 5th wheel. My boyfriend had mentioned this is a good and easy way to cook a turkey. It made one of the best turkeys I've ever tasted! The skin was nice and crispy and the inside was flavorful and moist. We made a 12 pound turkey in about 3-4 hours. Apparently you can make ribs, whole poultry, anything in it really.
customer_reviews.author: Lotsocurls1

customer_reviews.title: Thanksgiving over seas
customer_reviews.text: We are stationed in Germany - needless to say our oven is very small so planning Thanksgiving, and all of the cooking of our favorites that go with it seemed to be a challenge - Then we found this!!! Excited to use it for our turkey so that I can use the oven for sides. Also it was delivered to our CMR in 2 weeks!!!!! - Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: FRUSTRATING
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly frustrating! Retiring it. Instructions, if you want to call it that do not explain how to put it together. I’m not convinced I have all the pieces. After 2 hours, it’s going back in the box and being returned. I was so excited but the lack of support to assembly is what sent me over the edge. Seriously Char-broil you can do better and maybe keep a few customers.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Assembly issues
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed with this product when it had to be assembled. First, the legs that you need to put together did not stay snapped together where they were supposed to. Second, and the real issue, was when you had to screw them on to the body of the cooker the screw holes did not line up. I had to re drill 4 holes in the legs to actually get them installed which cost me an extra hour to assemble. It appears that quality control is very limited in the manufacturing process. I'll review the actual workings of the fryer once I have used it a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Gacioch

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cooker!!
customer_reviews.text: I had never fried a turkey in a regular oil fryer..( I was too scared to LOL ) The Big Easy made a great turkey the first time I tried it. I had about a 10lb turkey it took about 2 1/2 hours. I used my temperature probes and the one that came with it as well. The cooking and browning/crisping was perfect. As the instructions says to put the lid on about the last 30 to 45 minutes to crisp and brown it. Results were perfect. I cannot wait to use it again for wings, ribs, and chicken!
customer_reviews.author: Carol L Wilkison

customer_reviews.title: Not a fryer !!!
customer_reviews.text: I rated this product low because it’s not a fryer. It does not give you the fry taste in food. It’s a oven which works great. If it was market as a oven I will rated five stars. If you want a oven that works great this is for you. But if you want a fryer do not purchase this to substitute your oil fryer.
customer_reviews.author: kelvin peralta

customer_reviews.title: Best turkey ever
customer_reviews.text: Our Christmas turkey was delicious. This was so easy to use. Make sure you use a thermometer. Don’t go by time, go by temperature. So excited the kids gave my husband the accessories that go with it, so can’t wait to try other meats.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bauernfeind

customer_reviews.title: I love a roaster that doesn't heat up my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This oil-less fryer is a great roaster that will cook anything you normally roast in the oven to perfection. Turkeys, chickens, legs of lamb, brisket, and other roasted items come out cooked perfectly. I am so glad that I bought this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean, great results
customer_reviews.text: This thing was really all it is sold as. I've deep fried and this was a lot less of a headache. That being said I would still also deep fry a turkey again as I had good results but much more to deal with. We did a jerk turkey with a marinade and it came out juicy and delicious. It took an hour and 45 minutes to get to temp. Very easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.author: JustinRichard

customer_reviews.title: Love the way the Big Easy cooks the meats and ...
customer_reviews.text: We have used this many times. Love the way the Big Easy cooks the meats and does not dry them out. Have cooked ribs and a prime rib and needlessly to say, they both were outstanding. So Happy on my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Crisp and moist
customer_reviews.text: Gives a nice crisp outer layer and moist center. Not a faster way to cook though. I’ve done a ham and whole chicken so far and both took just as long as the oven.
customer_reviews.author: trwrocks

customer_reviews.title: Will continue to buy over the years
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing. First time my dog chewed the hose and assembly, which immediately made me buy a second. I’ve cooked ribs, steaks, pork loins, turkey, chicken, and vegetables in this and they always come out perfect. I use this more than I do my grill and oven. It doesn’t use as much propane as I thought it would, I’ve used it for several hours and only used a gallon at most.
customer_reviews.author: Addy Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: Used it 4 times and it stopped working will not light contacted amazon zero help useless piece of junk now. Wish I could give it zero stars. Lost a 100 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: IAmAli

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: 15 lb turkey on thangsgiving should take approximately 2.5 hours. We are now on hour # 6 and the internal temperature is only 124. Awful piece of garbage. Stick with an oil fryer. Oil less doesn't work. Returning this.
customer_reviews.author: JMAR

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing ROCKS! Got it to cook Thanksgiving turkey, which it did perfectly. Everyone commented on how it tasted better than the deep fried turkeys from the past few years. It was so good that I've started cooking everything I can get away with in it. Roasts are unbeatable in it.
customer_reviews.author: lizzard

customer_reviews.title: Does not cook evenly
customer_reviews.text: We were thrilled to try this out. Received it, set-up and fired up; 1st attempt was a turkey but the outcome was it only cooked the top portion. We thought perhaps we were not blocking any potential breezes affecting even heat so on attempt #2, we put the fryer in an enclosed garage, same result.
customer_reviews.author: cuintexas

customer_reviews.title: There are faster alternatives
customer_reviews.text: Cooked a 14 lb. turkey in it, and took almost 5 hours. It did cook it well and was moist and teary. Just thought it took too long.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Fan...freaking...tastic
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a six if I could. This thing makes the best turkey EVER!!! Thanks guys at charbroil....now I get to make the turkey for Thanksgiving, Christmas and ALWAYS....you guys suck for making such a great product!!.
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Turkey
customer_reviews.text: Once I finally worked to assemble this grill I was thrilled with the results. It was intimidating at first to assemble the few parts needed since I did not want to cause a fire. Luckily once I began it was fairly easy. Having this unit saved me 4 hours on thanksgiving day because I could use the oven for other things later in the day all while the turkey was cooking outside. There was also no mess and very easy clean up. This was the best early Christmas gift to myself. Can't wait to use this again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Alali George

customer_reviews.title: The Char Broil works great. I had done two turkeys and one pork ...
customer_reviews.text: The Char Broil works great. I had done two turkeys and one pork roasts since I've purchased it and they all turned out great. I would recommend not to cook a turkey that is to big. A average size bird around 12 Lbs. cooks really evenly. Great product, planning on using it this summer camping.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley C.

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Big Easy Oil-less Liquid Propane Turkey Fryer
product_meta.description: Style:FryerThe Char-Broil Big Easy TRU-Infrared Oil-less Turkey Fryer is the stress-free way to fry your turkey. With no hot cooking oil to purchase, splatter, or dispose of, the Char-Broil Big Easy gives you a delicious, safe, and simple alternative to oil-fried turkey. The Big Easy uses infrared heat to cook a turkey from start to finish just as quickly as oil-frying - and, of course, food cooked without oil is healthier, too! The meat is always cooked evenly inside of a double-wall cylindrical cooking chamber, powered by a fully enclosed propane burner. Char-Broil's patented Heat Wave infrared technology prevents flare-ups, eliminates hot and cold spots, and delivers juicy, crisp, and flavorful results every time. Safely cook a turkey (up to 16 lbs.) or chicken in about 8 to 10 minutes per pound, (slightly longer for roasts and most other large cuts of meat cook), there is no waiting for the oil to heat up. You can prepare your bird or meat with the same injectable marinade you already use, or you can use seasoned rubs on the outside - which is not an option with traditional fryers. Experience the flavor when infrared heat circles the cooker to penetrate the meat evenly and seal in juices. The result is a bird that's moist on the inside and crispy on the outside without the risk, hassle or added fat and calories of oil.
feature_bullets: Oil-less Turkey Fryer offers a healthier way to cook
Powered by Char-Broil TRU-Infrared cooking technology delivering juicy results inside and a crispy outside every time.
Prepare perfect whole turkeys, chicken, or roasts up to 16 pounds
No hot oil to burn, splatter, or spill- save money and stress without having to purchase or dispose of any oil
Includes cooker, cooking basket with lifter, meat thermometer, lid and quick start cooking guide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,639 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
